str2: No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To say, declare. Properly, the same as the base of phos and phaino; to show or make known one's thoughts, i.e. Speak or say.
When, at what time. From the base of pou and te; interrogative adverb, at what time.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To collect, gather. From sun and lego in its original sense; to collect.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To root out, pluck up by the roots. From ek and rhizoo; to uproot.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Wheat, grain. Also plural irregular neuter sita of uncertain derivation; grain, especially wheat.
A primary particle; properly, at the 'same' time, but freely used as a preposition or adverb denoting close association.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
